Articles.Content: when the client tries to download from kerbalstuff. Should I install the mods manually ?

Depending on what you're trying to do, I'd suggest waiting a few days if you can to give the situation a chance to stabilize. There is at least one effort to rebuild that site from the source code and torrent that was released, and if that pans out, then the CKAN admins should be able to do a mass search/replace to switch everything over to the new site. If that happens, everything might start working fine again when it's done.

In a less perfect world, mod authors may need to update links one by one, or the new site may not materialize, or it may have worse reliability, etc. It's too soon to know at this point.
Thread locked, please continue discussion of the KS shutdown here so we are not flooded with duplicate threads.
